data.eml:eml: Yaothrips as a new synonym of Pezothrips, with description of the male of Pezothrips pediculae comb. n. (Thysanoptera: Thripidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tong, Xiaoli, Liu, Liangxin (2019): Yaothrips as a new synonym of Pezothrips, with description of the male of Pezothrips pediculae comb. n. (Thysanoptera: Thripidae). Zootaxa 4646 (3): 598-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4646.3.12
